channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Vanguard’s Former OCIO Clients Must Stand Their Ground
item.description: Vanguard's OCIO clients should be wary of the higher-fee active funds and alternative investments that are now open to them.

item.title: France’s post-election political chaos sets the stage for a weak government and a lower global profile
item.description: “The absence of majority and the absence of government will expose France and French people to formidable danger.”

item.title: Are Your Data Governance and Management Practices Keeping Pace with the AI Boom?
item.description: No matter how sophisticated and expensive a firm's AI tools are, it should not forget that the principle “garbage in, garbage out” (GIGO) applies to the entire investment management process.

item.title: Paramount Global special committee backs merger with David Ellison’s Skydance Media
item.description: The full board is set to approve the deal with the parties signing final paperwork Sunday and an announcement coming as soon as Monday.

item.title: Book Review: Default
item.description: Argentina’s debt restructuring tests the theoretical limits of chaos theory. Gregory Makoff's feat is to build his narrative as a thriller without losing the detailed facts valued by specialists.

item.title: Hedge funds have no idea what to do about Tesla as shares rally while Trump, tariffs, and backlash against ‘woke’ EVs loom
item.description: It’s not clear if Tesla is “a top company with a great management team” or “a challenged franchise with deficient corporate governance.”

item.title: Conundrum Cubed: Scope 3 for Financials
item.description: Proxy data and estimates are likely to play an important role in plugging disclosure gaps in financial institutions' Scope 3 emissions.

item.title: Texas braces for Beryl as storm threatens to regain hurricane strength before making landfall
item.description: A hurricane warning extended from Baffin Bay, south of Corpus Christi, to Sargent, south of Houston.

item.title: Hedge Funds: A Poor Choice for Most Long-Term Investors?
item.description: By allocating to a diversified pool of hedge funds, many institutional investors are unwittingly reducing their equity holdings.

item.title: Euro falls as France’s left wing looks to score stunning election victory, raising fears of more spending and deeper deficits
item.description: The common currency slipped 0.3% to around $1.0807 at the start of the session in Asia.
